00078     public function open()
00079     {
00080         if ( file_exists( $this->m_sFileName ) )
00081         {
00082             if ( false !== ( $this->m_iFileHandle = @fopen( $this->m_sFileName, 'a+' ) ) )
00083                 $this->m_iFileHandle = @fopen( $this->m_sFileName, 'r' );
00084         }
00085 
00086         return $this->validHandle();
00087     }

00090     {

00092         $this->m_iFileSize = $this->m_iFileHandle = false;
00093     }

00096     {
00097         return $this->validHandle() && filesize( $this->m_sFileName );
